subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
Death and Dying
lead_paragraph: When Christian Benítez left the field after making his debut for the Qatari soccer team El Jaish on Sunday, he seemed fit and well. One day later, he was dead.
snippet: When Christian Benítez left the field after making his debut for the Qatari soccer team El Jaish on Sunday, he seemed fit and well. One day later, he was dead.
